array.title: Android Studio Tutorial For Beginners
array.description: Learn how to install Android Studio and then go through this tutorial to build your very first app

array.title: How to Support High Resolution on iOS - @1x @2x @3x
array.description: Learn how to support multiple screen resolutions and devices such as iPhone 4, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus

array.title: How to build an Apple TV App Tutorial for tvOS
array.description: In this app we download popular movies from an IMDB service and implement scrolling and navigation on the Apple TV

array.title: Photoshop Tutorial For Beginners How To Create a Log
array.description: Learn how to make a professional logo in Photoshop without any design experience. This is a Photoshop tutorial for beginners that will give you all the basics of Photoshop that you need to make a logo.
